nodes.text: The Atrisian Assault Corps was the elite special forces unit serving under the Kitel Phard emperors of the Atrisian Empire. It was a fast and hard-hitting unit capable of overcoming any enemy force it faced. The Assault Corps included His Majesty's Roto-gunners, the Imperial Atrisian Grenadiers, and the Queen's Own Armored Cavalry Troop.
